content: Please ask a {{productName}} owner or administrator to enable the corresponding service in the Integration section of the {{productName}} Settings.

comment.text: This translation key is used to provide a tooltip or hint for users when they need to enable third-party integration in the {{productName}} settings. The text appears as a tooltip next to a button that triggers this action in the Create/Edit Room Dialog component, indicating the step required to proceed further.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'يرجى' (yarja) is a slightly formal way to say 'please'. A more common and natural phrasing in Saudi Arabian Arabic could be used.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: من فضلك (min fadlik)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the phrase 'في قسم التكامل ضمن إعدادات {{productName}}' could be slightly more fluid. The order of 'التكامل' (integration) and 'إعدادات' (settings) could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: في قسم التكامل بإعدادات {{productName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a semicolon where a period might be more appropriate, especially in a formal instruction. It's stylistically less common to end sentences with semicolons in Azerbaijani.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lütfən, {{productName}} sahibindən və ya administratordan {{productName}} Parametrlərinin İnteqrasiya bölməsində müvafiq xidməti aktivləşdirməsini xahiş edin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translated text uses a semicolon (;) which is less common in Bulgarian sentence structure and feels slightly unnatural. A conjunction like 'и' would flow better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Моля, помолете собственик или администратор на {{productName}} да активира съответната услуга в раздела Интегриране на настройките на {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Czech translation contains a period at the end of 'Nastavení.' It should be separated from the previous part of the sentence with a comma.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Požádejte prosím vlastníka nebo správce {{productName}} o povolení příslušné služby v sekci Integrace u {{productName}}, Nastavení.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The German translation uses a hyphenated compound word "Integration" which might not be ideal for readability. Consider using a space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bitten Sie einen {{productName}}-Besitzer oder -Administrator, den entsprechenden Dienst im Abschnitt "Integration" (with a space) der {{productName}}-Einstellungen zu aktivieren.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Greek translation uses a full stop (.) after 'Ρυθμίσεις' which is not standard in this context. A colon (:) or no punctuation is more appropriate to follow the product name.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace '.' with ':' or remove the punctuation entirely after '{{productName}}'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "habilite el servicio correspondiente" is a bit formal and not the most natural way to say "enable the corresponding service". A more natural phrasing would be "active el servicio correspondiente" or "configure el servicio correspondiente".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Por favor, pida al propietario o administrador de {{productName}} que active el servicio correspondiente en la sección Integración de la Configuración de {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The colon in "{{productName}}:n" feels slightly unnatural in Finnish. While grammatically correct, a more natural phrasing might omit it.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ole hyvä ja pyydä {{productName}} omistajaa tai pääkäyttäjää ottamaan käyttöön vastaava palvelu {{productName}} asetusten integraatio-osiossa.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'des paramètres' after 'section Intégration' is slightly awkward and could be improved for flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Veuillez demander au propriétaire ou à l'administrateur de {{productName}} d'activer le service correspondant dans la section Intégration des {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a bit awkward. While grammatically correct, it could be improved for natural flow. Using a more direct phrasing would be better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Խնդրում ենք {{productName}}-ի սեփականատիրոջը կամ ադմինիստրատորին ակտիվացնել համապատասխան ծառայությունը {{productName}} կարգավորումների ինտեգրման բաժնում:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: “enable” is translated as “միացնել” which is more accurately 'turn on'. 'activate' (ակտիվացնել) would be a more appropriate translation for the context of enabling a service within a settings panel.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Խնդրում ենք {{productName}}-ի սեփականատիրոջը կամ ադմինիստրատորին ակտիվացնել համապատասխան ծառայությունը {{productName}} կարգավորումների ինտեգրման բաժնում:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation uses a mix of Lao and English words (e.g., 'Settings'). It would be more consistent to translate 'Settings' into Lao if possible. Although understandable, it detracts from the overall localization.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'Settings' to something like 'ການຕັ້ງຄ່າລວມ' (kan tang kha long)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a period (.) after 'Integrācija'. While grammatically correct, the English original does not have a period at the end of the sentence. Consistency in formatting is preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lūdziet {{productName}} īpašniekam vai administratoram iespējot atbilstošo pakalpojumu {{productName}} iestatījumu sadaļā Integrācija

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Dutch translation uses 'Integratie' (capitalized) which should consistently match the English 'Integration' if it refers to a specific section. Consider lowercasing to 'integratie' for consistency, unless 'Integratie' is a formally named section.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'integratie' instead of 'Integratie'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation uses a comma (,) instead of a period (.) to separate the clauses 'w sekcji Integracja' and 'w ustawieniach {{productName}}'. In Polish, a period is generally preferred.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Poproś właściciela lub administratora {{productName}} o włączenie odpowiedniej usługi w sekcji Integracja. w ustawieniach {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Portuguese translation uses 'das Configurações' which is less common and slightly awkward. It would be more natural to use 'em Configurações'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Peça a um proprietário ou administrador de {{productName}} para ativar o serviço correspondente na seção Integração em Configurações de {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'das {{productName}} Configurações' is not idiomatic Portuguese. It's unnecessarily adding 'das' which implies possession when it's not needed. It sounds awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Solicite ao proprietário ou administrador do {{productName}} que ative o serviço correspondente na seção Integração do {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The variable {{productName}} is not consistently formatted. While present in both the English and Romanian versions, ensuring consistent casing and spacing is recommended for clarity and maintainability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure consistent casing and spacing for the variable {{productName}} throughout the translated content.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'සක්‍රීය' (sakriya) is a valid word but 'ප්‍රවර්ධනය' (prawadhanya) could be more appropriate depending on the context. 'සක්‍රීය' means 'active' and can sometimes imply something was previously inactive, while the context here indicates enabling a feature.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: කරුණාකර {{productName}} සැකසීම්වල ඒකාබද්ධ කිරීමේ කොටසේ අනුරූප සේවාව ප්‍රවර්ධනය කරන ලෙස {{productName}} හිමිකරුවෙකුගෙන් හෝ පරිපාලකයෙකුගෙන් ඉල්ලා සිටින්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the use of 'හෝ' (ho) directly after 'එකතු' can sound slightly less fluent. Replacing it with a comma or slight rewording might improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: කරුණාකර {{productName}} සැකසීම්වල ඒකාබද්ධ කිරීමේ කොටසෙහි අනුරූප සේවාව සක්‍රීය කරන ලෙස {{productName}} හිමිකරුවෙකුගෙන්, හෝ පරිපාලකයෙකුගෙන් ඉල්ලා සිටින්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English term 'service' is better translated as 'službu' rather than 'funkciu'. While 'funkcia' isn't *incorrect*, 'službu' aligns more closely with the intended meaning of an integrated service.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Požiadajte vlastníka alebo administrátora {{productName}}, aby povolil príslušnú službu v časti Integrácia v nastaveniach {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Prosite lastnika ali skrbnika" is a bit clunky and could be more naturally translated. While technically correct, it's not the most elegant way to phrase a request in Slovenian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Please ask the {{productName}} owner or administrator to enable the corresponding service in the Integration section of the {{productName}} Settings.  Could be rephrased to something like 'Prosim lastnika ali upravljalca {{productName}}, da omogoči...' or 'Povabite lastnika ali skrbnika {{productName}}, da omogoči...'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'одговарајућу' (odgovarajuću) could be slightly improved for better flow in this context. It translates to 'corresponding' but feels a bit formal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Молимо вас да замолите власника или администратора {{productName}} да омогући релевантну услугу у одељку за интеграцију у Подешавањима {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation includes a space before the opening curly brace '{' in '{{productName}}'. While not strictly incorrect, it's unusual and inconsistent with typical formatting in user interfaces.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the space before the opening curly brace: {{productName}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Etentgrasyon' is misspelled. It should be 'Entegrasyon'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Entegrasyon

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "bật dịch vụ tương ứng" is a somewhat literal translation of "enable the corresponding service." A more natural Vietnamese phrasing would be "kích hoạt dịch vụ liên quan" or "bật tính năng liên quan".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vui lòng yêu cầu chủ sở hữu hoặc quản trị viên {{productName}} kích hoạt dịch vụ liên quan trong phần Tích hợp của Cài đặt {{productName}}.
